summary: Tested coach experience features: Coach access to full observation data, My Coaching tab, and Add Reflection functionality. All features working correctly.

issues: Chart console warnings: 'width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0' - minor rendering issue with Recharts, doesn't affect functionality

coach_session_access.details: Coach (Joe Morrissey) can access /session/:sessionId/review page for sessions assigned to them. API returns full observation data.

observation_data_visibility.details: Coach sees full observation data on Summary tab: duration (00:05), events (2), ball rolling time, Coach Interventions (Command, Q&A, Guided Discovery, Transmission), Content Focus descriptors, Delivery Method descriptors

reflections_tab.details: Coach sees Reflections tab with Observer's Notes (read-only, no edit controls) and Coach Reflections section (editable textarea)

coach_add_reflection.details: Coach can type in reflection textarea and submit reflections. Coach reflection textarea found with data-testid='coach-reflection-textarea'

observer_controls_hidden.details: Observer edit/delete buttons correctly hidden for coach user. No add-observer-reflection-btn or observer-reflection-textarea visible

my_development_tabs.details: My Development page has all 4 tabs: Overview, My Coaching, My Sessions, My Targets

my_coaching_tab.details: My Coaching tab shows: My Profile section with coach name and avatar, Stats (Sessions Observed: 8, Active Targets: 2, Targets Achieved: 0), Session Activity chart, Recent Sessions list

my_sessions_add_reflection.details: My Sessions tab shows 'Add Reflection' buttons (7 found) for sessions needing reflection. Sessions display 'Has Observation' and 'Needs Reflection' badges.

sessions_needing_reflection_first.details: Sessions needing reflection appear first in the list with blue styling (bg-blue-50). Found 7 blue-styled items out of 8 total sessions.

pending_reflection_api.details: API correctly returns has_pending_reflection: true with pending_reflection_session_id for coach dashboard

critical_code_review_comments: CoachDashboard.jsx has 'Complete Your Reflection' prompt but it's not currently routed - CoachMyDevelopment.jsx handles this via 'Add Reflection' buttons instead. Consider consolidating or removing unused CoachDashboard component.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test session session_1771027651648_48n1993la
context_for_next_testing_agent: All coach experience features verified working. Coach can access session review pages, see full observation data, view observer notes read-only, add their own reflections. My Development page has 4 tabs with My Coaching tab mirroring coach profile view. Sessions needing reflection show blue styling and appear first with 'Add Reflection' buttons.
